item.title: How to Install Nextcloud
item.description: If you followed this you now have a server. It’s now time to start utilizing it. In this guide we will be setting up Nextcloud. Nextcloud is a free (Open Source) Dropbox-like software. The project is written in PHP and JavaScript. It supports many database systems such as MySQL/MariaDB, PostgreSQL, Oracle Database and SQLite. To allow Synchronization between server, desktop and mobile phone, Nextcloud provides applications for Windows, Linux and Mac desktop.
